name: plus
title: Google+ API
description: Builds on top of the Google+ platform.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

fields.name: actor
fields.desc: The person who performed this activity.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the actor's Person resource.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The image representation of the actor.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the actor's profile photo. To resize the image and crop it to a square, append the query string ?sz=x, where x is the dimension in pixels of each side.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: An object representation of the individual components of name.

fields.name: familyName
fields.desc: The family name ("last name") of the actor.

fields.name: givenName
fields.desc: The given name ("first name") of the actor.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The link to the actor's Google profile.

fields.name: verification
fields.desc: Verification status of actor.

fields.name: adHocVerified
fields.desc: Verification for one-time or manual processes.

fields.name: clientSpecificActorInfo
fields.desc: Actor info specific to particular clients.

fields.name: youtubeActorInfo
fields.desc: Actor info specific to YouTube clients.

fields.name: channelId
fields.desc: ID of the YouTube channel owned by the Actor.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The name of the actor, suitable for display.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of this activity.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as an activity. Value: "plus#activity".

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: The time at which this activity was last updated. Formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp.

fields.name: geocode
fields.desc: Latitude and longitude where this activity occurred. Format is latitude followed by longitude, space separated.

fields.name: placeId
fields.desc: ID of the place where this activity occurred.

fields.name: placeName
fields.desc: Name of the place where this activity occurred.

fields.name: access
fields.desc: Identifies who has access to see this activity.

fields.name: address
fields.desc: Street address where this activity occurred.

fields.name: annotation
fields.desc: Additional content added by the person who shared this activity, applicable only when resharing an activity.

fields.name: crosspostSource
fields.desc: If this activity is a crosspost from another system, this property specifies the ID of the original activity.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of this response for caching purposes.

fields.name: radius
fields.desc: Radius, in meters, of the region where this activity occurred, centered at the latitude and longitude identified in geocode.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: Title of this activity.

fields.name: location
fields.desc: The location where this activity occurred.

fields.name: object
fields.desc: The object of this activity.

fields.name: attachments
fields.desc: The media objects attached to this activity.

fields.name: embed
fields.desc: If the attachment is a video, the embeddable link.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: Media type of the link.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: URL of the link.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The preview image for photos or videos.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height, in pixels, of the linked resource.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: Media type of the link.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: Image URL.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width, in pixels, of the linked resource.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The link to the attachment, which should be of type text/html.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: If the attachment is an article, this property contains a snippet of text from the article. It can also include descriptions for other types.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The title of the attachment, such as a photo caption or an article title.

fields.name: fullImage
fields.desc: The full image URL for photo attachments.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height, in pixels, of the linked resource.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: Media type of the link.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: URL of the image.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width, in pixels, of the linked resource.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the attachment.

fields.name: objectType
fields.desc:
The type of media object. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "photo" - A photo. 
- "album" - A photo album. 
- "video" - A video. 
- "article" - An article, specified by a link.

fields.name: thumbnails
fields.desc: If the attachment is an album, this property is a list of potential additional thumbnails from the album.

fields.name: description
fields.desc: Potential name of the thumbnail.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: Image resource.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height, in pixels, of the linked resource.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: Media type of the link.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: Image url.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width, in pixels, of the linked resource.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: URL of the webpage containing the image.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The HTML-formatted content, which is suitable for display.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the object. When resharing an activity, this is the ID of the activity that is being reshared.

fields.name: objectType
fields.desc:
The type of the object. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "note" - Textual content. 
- "activity" - A Google+ activity.

fields.name: replies
fields.desc: Comments in reply to this activity.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The URL for the collection of comments in reply to this activity.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: Total number of comments on this activity.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL that points to the linked resource.

fields.name: actor
fields.desc: If this activity's object is itself another activity, such as when a person reshares an activity, this property specifies the original activity's actor.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: A link to the original actor's Google profile.

fields.name: verification
fields.desc: Verification status of actor.

fields.name: adHocVerified
fields.desc: Verification for one-time or manual processes.

fields.name: clientSpecificActorInfo
fields.desc: Actor info specific to particular clients.

fields.name: youtubeActorInfo
fields.desc: Actor info specific to YouTube clients.

fields.name: channelId
fields.desc: ID of the YouTube channel owned by the Actor.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The original actor's name, which is suitable for display.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: ID of the original actor.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The image representation of the original actor.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: A URL that points to a thumbnail photo of the original actor.

fields.name: originalContent
fields.desc: The content (text) as provided by the author, which is stored without any HTML formatting. When creating or updating an activity, this value must be supplied as plain text in the request.

fields.name: plusoners
fields.desc: People who +1'd this activity.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The URL for the collection of people who +1'd this activity.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: Total number of people who +1'd this activity.

fields.name: resharers
fields.desc: People who reshared this activity.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: Total number of people who reshared this activity.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The URL for the collection of resharers.

fields.name: published
fields.desc: The time at which this activity was initially published. Formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp.

fields.name: provider
fields.desc: The service provider that initially published this activity.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: Name of the service provider.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The link to this activity.

fields.name: verb
fields.desc:
This activity's verb, which indicates the action that was performed. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "post" - Publish content to the stream. 
- "share" - Reshare an activity.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: Link to this resource.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The title of this collection of people.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: The total number of people available in this list. The number of people in a response might be smaller due to paging. This might not be set for all collections.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of this response for caching purposes.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The people in this page of results. Each item includes the id, displayName, image, and url for the person. To retrieve additional profile data, see the people.get method.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as a collection of people. Value: "plus#peopleFeed".

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. Provide this value in a subsequent request to return the next page of results.

fields.name: address
fields.desc: The physical address of the place.

fields.name: formatted
fields.desc: The formatted address for display.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The display name of the place.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The id of the place.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as a place. Value: "plus#place".

fields.name: position
fields.desc: The position of the place.

fields.name: latitude
fields.desc: The latitude of this position.

fields.name: longitude
fields.desc: The longitude of this position.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: A descriptive name for this entry. Suitable for display.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the entry. For entries of type "person" or "circle", this is the ID of the resource. For other types, this property is not set.

fields.name: type
fields.desc:
The type of entry describing to whom access is granted. Possible values are:  
- "person" - Access to an individual. 
- "circle" - Access to members of a circle. 
- "myCircles" - Access to members of all the person's circles. 
- "extendedCircles" - Access to members of all the person's circles, plus all of the people in their circles. 
- "domain" - Access to members of the person's Google Apps domain. 
- "public" - Access to anyone on the web.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The list of access entries.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as a collection of access controls. Value: "plus#acl".

fields.name: description
fields.desc: Description of the access granted, suitable for display.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of this response for caching purposes.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of this collection of activities. Deprecated.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. Provide this value in a subsequent request to return the next page of results.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: Link to this activity resource.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The title of this collection of activities, which is a truncated portion of the content.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The activities in this page of results.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as a collection of activities. Value: "plus#activityFeed".

fields.name: nextLink
fields.desc: Link to the next page of activities.

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: The time at which this collection of activities was last updated. Formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp.

fields.name: published
fields.desc: The time at which this comment was initially published. Formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: Link to this comment resource.

fields.name: verb
fields.desc:
This comment's verb, indicating what action was performed. Possible values are:  
- "post" - Publish content to the stream.

fields.name: actor
fields.desc: The person who posted this comment.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: A link to the Person resource for this actor.

fields.name: verification
fields.desc: Verification status of actor.

fields.name: adHocVerified
fields.desc: Verification for one-time or manual processes.

fields.name: clientSpecificActorInfo
fields.desc: Actor info specific to particular clients.

fields.name: youtubeActorInfo
fields.desc: Actor info specific to YouTube clients.

fields.name: channelId
fields.desc: ID of the YouTube channel owned by the Actor.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The name of this actor, suitable for display.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the actor.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The image representation of this actor.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the actor's profile photo. To resize the image and crop it to a square, append the query string ?sz=x, where x is the dimension in pixels of each side.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of this comment.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as a comment. Value: "plus#comment".

fields.name: object
fields.desc: The object of this comment.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The HTML-formatted content, suitable for display.

fields.name: objectType
fields.desc:
The object type of this comment. Possible values are:  
- "comment" - A comment in reply to an activity.

fields.name: originalContent
fields.desc: The content (text) as provided by the author, stored without any HTML formatting. When creating or updating a comment, this value must be supplied as plain text in the request.

fields.name: plusoners
fields.desc: People who +1'd this comment.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: Total number of people who +1'd this comment.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of this response for caching purposes.

fields.name: inReplyTo
fields.desc: The activity this comment replied to.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the activity.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the activity.

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: The time at which this comment was last updated. Formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as a collection of comments. Value: "plus#commentFeed".

fields.name: nextLink
fields.desc: Link to the next page of activities.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. Provide this value in a subsequent request to return the next page of results.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The title of this collection of comments.

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: The time at which this collection of comments was last updated. Formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of this response for caching purposes.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of this collection of comments.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The comments in this page of results.

fields.name: placesLived
fields.desc: A list of places where this person has lived.

fields.name: primary
fields.desc: If "true", this place of residence is this person's primary residence.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: A place where this person has lived. For example: "Seattle, WA", "Near Toronto".

fields.name: urls
fields.desc: A list of URLs for this person.

fields.name: label
fields.desc: The label of the URL.

fields.name: type
fields.desc:
The type of URL. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "otherProfile" - URL for another profile. 
- "contributor" - URL to a site for which this person is a contributor. 
- "website" - URL for this Google+ Page's primary website. 
- "other" - Other URL.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: The URL value.

fields.name: verified
fields.desc: Whether the person or Google+ Page has been verified.

fields.name: emails
fields.desc: A list of email addresses that this person has, including their Google account email address, and the public verified email addresses on their Google+ profile. The plus.profile.emails.read scope is needed to retrieve these email addresses, or the email scope can be used to retrieve just the Google account email address.

fields.name: type
fields.desc:
The type of address. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "account" - Google account email address. 
- "home" - Home email address. 
- "work" - Work email address. 
- "other" - Other.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: The email address.

fields.name: gender
fields.desc:
The person's gender. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "male" - Male gender. 
- "female" - Female gender. 
- "other" - Other.

fields.name: objectType
fields.desc:
Type of person within Google+. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "person" - represents an actual person. 
- "page" - represents a page.

fields.name: birthday
fields.desc: The person's date of birth, represented as YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: circledByCount
fields.desc: For followers who are visible, the number of people who have added this person or page to a circle.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The name of this person, which is suitable for display.

fields.name: isPlusUser
fields.desc: Whether this user has signed up for Google+.

fields.name: plusOneCount
fields.desc: If a Google+ Page, the number of people who have +1'd this page.

fields.name: ageRange
fields.desc: The age range of the person. Valid ranges are 17 or younger, 18 to 20, and 21 or older. Age is determined from the user's birthday using Western age reckoning.

fields.name: max
fields.desc:
The age range's upper bound, if any. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following:  
- "17" - for age 17 
- "20" - for age 20

fields.name: min
fields.desc:
The age range's lower bound, if any. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following:  
- "21" - for age 21 
- "18" - for age 18

fields.name: cover
fields.desc: The cover photo content.

fields.name: coverInfo
fields.desc: Extra information about the cover photo.

fields.name: leftImageOffset
fields.desc: The difference between the left position of the cover image and the actual displayed cover image. Only valid for banner layout.

fields.name: topImageOffset
fields.desc: The difference between the top position of the cover image and the actual displayed cover image. Only valid for banner layout.

fields.name: coverPhoto
fields.desc: The person's primary cover image.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the image.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width of the image.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height of the image.

fields.name: layout
fields.desc:
The layout of the cover art. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "banner" - One large image banner.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of this response for caching purposes.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this resource as a person. Value: "plus#person".

fields.name: name
fields.desc: An object representation of the individual components of a person's name.

fields.name: givenName
fields.desc: The given name (first name) of this person.

fields.name: honorificPrefix
fields.desc: The honorific prefixes (such as "Dr." or "Mrs.") for this person.

fields.name: honorificSuffix
fields.desc: The honorific suffixes (such as "Jr.") for this person.

fields.name: middleName
fields.desc: The middle name of this person.

fields.name: familyName
fields.desc: The family name (last name) of this person.

fields.name: formatted
fields.desc: The full name of this person, including middle names, suffixes, etc.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of this person's profile.

fields.name: nickname
fields.desc: The nickname of this person.

fields.name: skills
fields.desc: The person's skills.

fields.name: language
fields.desc: The user's preferred language for rendering.

fields.name: organizations
fields.desc: A list of current or past organizations with which this person is associated.

fields.name: startDate
fields.desc: The date that the person joined this organization.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The person's job title or role within the organization.

fields.name: type
fields.desc:
The type of organization. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "work" - Work. 
- "school" - School.

fields.name: department
fields.desc: The department within the organization. Deprecated.

fields.name: description
fields.desc: A short description of the person's role in this organization. Deprecated.

fields.name: location
fields.desc: The location of this organization. Deprecated.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: The name of the organization.

fields.name: primary
fields.desc: If "true", indicates this organization is the person's primary one, which is typically interpreted as the current one.

fields.name: endDate
fields.desc: The date that the person left this organization.

fields.name: tagline
fields.desc: The brief description (tagline) of this person.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of this person.

fields.name: occupation
fields.desc: The occupation of this person.

fields.name: relationshipStatus
fields.desc:
The person's relationship status. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values:  
- "single" - Person is single. 
- "in_a_relationship" - Person is in a relationship. 
- "engaged" - Person is engaged. 
- "married" - Person is married. 
- "its_complicated" - The relationship is complicated. 
- "open_relationship" - Person is in an open relationship. 
- "widowed" - Person is widowed. 
- "in_domestic_partnership" - Person is in a domestic partnership. 
- "in_civil_union" - Person is in a civil union.

fields.name: braggingRights
fields.desc: The "bragging rights" line of this person.

fields.name: currentLocation
fields.desc: (this field is not currently used)

fields.name: domain
fields.desc: The hosted domain name for the user's Google Apps account. For instance, example.com. The plus.profile.emails.read or email scope is needed to get this domain name.

fields.name: aboutMe
fields.desc: A short biography for this person.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The representation of the person's profile photo.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the person's profile photo. To resize the image and crop it to a square, append the query string ?sz=x, where x is the dimension in pixels of each side.

fields.name: isDefault
fields.desc: Whether the person's profile photo is the default one

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. To get the next page of results, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response. This token can be of any length.

optinalQueryParams.name: language
optinalQueryParams.desc: Specify the preferred language to search with. See search language codes for available values.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of activities to include in the response, which is used for paging. For any response, the actual number returned might be less than the specified maxResults.

optinalQueryParams.name: orderBy
optinalQueryParams.desc: Specifies how to order search results.

enum.name: best
enum.desc: Sort activities by relevance to the user, most relevant first.

enum.name: recent
enum.desc: Sort activities by published date, most recent first.

pathParams.name: activityId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the activity to get.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: List all of the activities in the specified collection for a particular user.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the user to get activities for. The special value "me" can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

pathParams.name: collection
pathParams.desc: The collection of activities to list.

enum.name: public
enum.desc: All public activities created by the specified user.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of activities to include in the response, which is used for paging. For any response, the actual number returned might be less than the specified maxResults.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. To get the next page of results, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: List all of the comments for an activity.

pathParams.name: activityId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the activity to get comments for.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. To get the next page of results, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response.

optinalQueryParams.name: sortOrder
optinalQueryParams.desc: The order in which to sort the list of comments.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of comments to include in the response, which is used for paging. For any response, the actual number returned might be less than the specified maxResults.

pathParams.name: commentId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the comment to get.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: List all of the people in the specified collection.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: Get the collection of people for the person identified. Use "me" to indicate the authenticated user.

pathParams.name: collection
pathParams.desc: The collection of people to list.

enum.name: connected
enum.desc: The list of visible people in the authenticated user's circles who also use the requesting app. This list is limited to users who made their app activities visible to the authenticated user.

enum.name: visible
enum.desc: The list of people who this user has added to one or more circles, limited to the circles visible to the requesting application.

optinalQueryParams.name: orderBy
optinalQueryParams.desc: The order to return people in.

enum.name: alphabetical
enum.desc: Order the people by their display name.

enum.name: best
enum.desc: Order people based on the relevence to the viewer.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. To get the next page of results, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of people to include in the response, which is used for paging. For any response, the actual number returned might be less than the specified maxResults.

methods.name: listByActivity
methods.desc: List all of the people in the specified collection for a particular activity.

pathParams.name: activityId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the activity to get the list of people for.

pathParams.name: collection
pathParams.desc: The collection of people to list.

enum.name: plusoners
enum.desc: List all people who have +1'd this activity.

enum.name: resharers
enum.desc: List all people who have reshared this activity.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. To get the next page of results, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of people to include in the response, which is used for paging. For any response, the actual number returned might be less than the specified maxResults.

requiredQueryParams.name: query
requiredQueryParams.desc: Specify a query string for full text search of public text in all profiles.

optinalQueryParams.name: language
optinalQueryParams.desc: Specify the preferred language to search with. See search language codes for available values.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of people to include in the response, which is used for paging. For any response, the actual number returned might be less than the specified maxResults.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The continuation token, which is used to page through large result sets. To get the next page of results, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response. This token can be of any length.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Get a person's profile. If your app uses scope https://www.googleapis.com/auth/plus.login, this method is guaranteed to return ageRange and language.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the person to get the profile for. The special value "me" can be used to indicate the authenticated user.
